gate_name: Sprint 1 Quality Gate: Secure Auth Foundation
criteria: All security rule tests for tenant isolation pass; Brute-force protection confirmed active; Password complexity is enforced server-side.
success_metrics: Zero critical security vulnerabilities identified in the auth module.

gate_name: Sprint 3 Quality Gate: Core Attendance Workflow
criteria: All E2E tests for online check-in/out pass on both iOS and Android; Location permission flow is verified on physical devices.
success_metrics: 99% success rate for check-in/out actions in the staging environment.

criteria: E2E tests for offline check-in and automatic sync pass with 100% data integrity; Persistent failure notification mechanism is fully functional.
tools_used: Flutter Integration Test, Manual network manipulation
success_metrics: Zero instances of data loss in offline-to-online test scenarios.
